text: Jiří Veselý was the defending champion and successfully defended his title, defeating Laslo Djere in the final, 6–4, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Category:2015 ATP Challenger Tour 2015 Singles
